          <title>
            <string language="en">Wavelength and amplitude of a sine wave</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlänge und Umfang einer Sinuswelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Longueur d'onde et amplitude d'une vague de

            <string language="en">The figure shows a sine wave with wavelength lambda and amplitude A</string>

          </description>
